Extracts the .options slot from a basic_control object

Extracts the .options slot from a basic_control object

Extracts options from a geex_control object

grab_options(object, ...)

# S4 method for basic_control
grab_options(object)

# S4 method for geex_control
grab_options(object, slot)

Arguments

object

a basic_control object
...

additional arguments passed to other methods
slot

name of the slot from which to grab the function. One of "deriv", "approx", or "root"

  • Arguments
